TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppDomainManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供非托管宿主的托管等效项。

span.span: Provides a managed equivalent of an unmanaged host.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用在 ASP.NET 中配置应用程序域。Do not use to configure an application domain in ASP.NET. 在 ASP.NET 中，配置必须由主机进行处理。In ASP.NET, configuration must be handled by the host. 实现类使主机的应用程序，以参与创建新的应用程序域。Implementing the class enables a hosting application to participate in the creation of new application domains. 要替换默认的，确定程序集和类型替换中 APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM 和 APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE 环境变量或使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)和[ \

](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)配置文件中的元素。To replace the default , identify the assembly and type of the replacement in the APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM and APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE environment variables, or use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in your configuration file. 程序集必须是完全受信任，并且包含在全局程序集缓存或起始应用程序的目录。The assembly must be fully trusted and be contained in the global assembly cache or the directory of the starting application. 在环境变量中必须完全限定的类型和程序集名称。The type and assembly names must be fully qualified in the environment variables. 例如:For example: `set APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE=MyNamespace.TestAppDomainManager` `set APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM=customappDomainmanager, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=f1368f7b12a08d72` > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果程序集包含的子类取决于程序集标记有条件(APTCA) 特性，你必须将传递给列表中包括这些程序集属性使用来创建应用程序域。If the assembly that contains your subclass of depends on assemblies that are marked with the conditional (APTCA) attribute, you must include those assemblies in the list that you pass to the property of the you use to create application domains. 否则，将禁用用条件 APTCA 特性标记的程序集。Otherwise, the assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute will be disabled. 为非托管主机的托管等效项。The is the managed equivalent of the unmanaged host. 对象参与的进程中的新应用程序域创建，并且可以自定义新其他托管的代码运行之前。An object participates in the creation of new application domains in a process and can customize the new before other managed code runs. 也可以提供主机管理器中使用公共语言运行时执行的其他方面。The can also supply host managers that participate in other aspects of common language runtime execution. 例如，可以标识参与应用程序域的安全决定的对象。For example, an can identify a object that participates in the security decisions of the application domain. > [!NOTE] > 程序集，授予`FullTrust`，如在全局程序集缓存中的程序集还是已标识为`fullTrustAssemblies`中方法可以加载在构造函数和方法。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. A直接调用方或派生的类没有基础结构权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下面的示例演示的非常简单实现。The following example shows a very simple implementation of . [!code-csharp[System.AppDomainManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/CS/customAppDomainManager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomainManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/VB/customAppDomainManager.vb#1)]

exception.span: 调用方没有正确的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permissions.
See the Requirements section.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

permission.span: 用于派生类可以插入公共语言运行时承载基础结构的可执行代码。

span.span: for derived classes to plug executable code into the common language runtime hosting infrastructure.
Associated enumeration: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 程序集，授予`FullTrust`，如在全局程序集缓存中的程序集还是已标识为`fullTrustAssemblies`中方法可以加载在构造函数和方法。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method.

summary.span: 获取应用程序激活器，该激活器用于激活相应域中的外接程序和基于清单的应用程序。

span.span: Gets the application activator that handles the activation of add-ins and manifest-based applications for the domain.
The application activator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有指定的单个实例中每个类激活调用路由到的所有外接程序和基于清单的应用程序。There is a single designated instance of the class in each to which all add-in and manifest-based application activation calls are routed. 当前可以提供其自己的自定义，或默认实例创建。The for the current can provide its own custom , or an instance of the default is created.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CheckSecuritySettings (System.Security.SecurityState state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CheckSecuritySettings(class System.Security.SecurityState state) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CheckSecuritySettings (state As SecurityState) As Boolean
public: virtual bool CheckSecuritySettings(System::Security::SecurityState ^ state);

param.name: state
param.span: 的一个子类，用来标识请求其安全状态的操作。

span.span: A subclass of that identifies the operation whose security status is requested.

summary.span: 指示是否允许在应用程序域中执行指定的操作。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified operation is allowed in the application domain.

returns.span: 如果宿主允许在应用程序域中执行 指定的操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the host allows the operation specified by to be performed in the application domain; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现返回`false`。The default implementation of this method returns `false`. 当调用此方法调用方法来增加独立的存储配额。This method is called when the method has been called to increase the isolated storage quota. 承载公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的应用程序可以重写方法来执行策略决策基于对象 (其继承)，，然后允许或禁止增加。An application that hosts the common language runtime (CLR) can override the method to perform policy decisions based on an object (which inherits ), and can then allow or prevent the increase. 例如，主机可能提示最终用户可以批准或拒绝请求，以增加配额。For example, a host could prompt the end user to approve or deny the request to increase the quota. 主机的实现应考虑到拒绝服务攻击的可能性。The host's implementation of should take into account the possibility of denial-of-service attacks. 例如，它应提示用户，仅当用户启动的事件中调用该方法，例如单击按钮。For example, it should prompt the user only if the method is called from a user-initiated event such as a button click.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual AppDomain CreateDomain (string friendlyName, System.Security.Policy.Evidence securityInfo, AppDomainSetup appDomainInfo);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AppDomain CreateDomain(string friendlyName, class System.Security.Policy.Evidence securityInfo, class System.AppDomainSetup appDomainInfo) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateDomain (friendlyName As String, securityInfo As Evidence, appDomainInfo As AppDomainSetup) As AppDomain
public: virtual AppDomain ^ CreateDomain(System::String ^ friendlyName, System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ securityInfo, AppDomainSetup ^ appDomainInfo);

span.span: The friendly name of the domain.

param.name: securityInfo
param.span: 一个对象，其中包含通过安全策略映射的证据，这些证据用于建立堆栈顶层的权限集。

span.span: An object that contains evidence mapped through the security policy to establish a top-of-stack permission set.

param.name: appDomainInfo
param.span: 包含应用程序域初始化信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains application domain initialization information.

summary.span: 返回新的或现有的应用程序域。

span.span: Returns a new or existing application domain.

returns.span: 新的或现有的应用程序域。

span.span: A new or existing application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的友好名称`friendlyName`参数，可以显示在用户界面，以标识域中。The friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 默认值方法调用受保护方法来创建。The default method calls the protected method to create the . 重写此方法不需要调用方法，但可以返回现有域。Overrides of this method do not need to call the method but can return an existing domain.

para.span: 继承自类并重写方法，你可以执行之前调用的自定义应用程序域初始化活动方法或不调用在所有的帮助器方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and override the method, you can perform custom application domain initialization activities before calling the method, or not call the helper method at all.

para.span: 例如，你可以修改作为传入的证据，更新关联的字段，或重新使用现有的域。

span.span: For example, you could modify the evidence passed in as , update the fields of the associated , or reuse an exiting domain.

span.span: Provides a helper method to create an application domain.
A newly created application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此受保护的帮助器方法可处理新的应用程序域的创建。This protected helper method handles the creation of a new application domain. 指定此友好名称`friendlyName`参数，可以显示在用户界面，以标识域中。This friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

span.span: is .
for controlling evidence.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Reflection.Assembly EntryAssembly { get; }
.property instance class System.Reflection.Assembly EntryAssembly
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property EntryAssembly As Assembly
public: virtual property System::Reflection::Assembly ^ EntryAssembly { System::Reflection::Assembly ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取应用程序的入口程序集。

span.span: Gets the entry assembly for an application.

value.span: 应用程序的入口程序集。

span.span: The entry assembly for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序清单激活应用程序，从应用程序清单确定入口程序集。If the application is a manifest-activated application, the entry assembly is determined from the application manifest. 如果应用程序不是清单激活，入口程序集将是默认应用程序域中的可执行过程。If the application is not manifest activated, the entry assembly is the process executable in the default application domain. 在其他应用程序域中，该条目程序集是由已执行的第一个可执行文件方法。In other application domains, the entry assembly is the first executable that was executed by the method.

value.span: 宿主执行上下文管理器。

span.span: The host execution context manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许主机提供，它可参与的执行上下文流跨异步调用。This property allows a host to provide a that can participate in the flow of the execution context across asynchronous calls.

The host security manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许主机提供参与应用程序域的安全决定。This property allows a host to provide a to participate in the security decisions for the application domain. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写的自定义应用程序域管理器的属性。The following example shows an override of the property for a custom application domain manager. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomainManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/CS/customAppDomainManager.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomainManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/VB/customAppDomainManager.vb#3)]

The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void InitializeNewDomain (AppDomainSetup appDomainInfo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeNewDomain(class System.AppDomainSetup appDomainInfo) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub InitializeNewDomain (appDomainInfo As AppDomainSetup)
public: virtual void InitializeNewDomain(AppDomainSetup ^ appDomainInfo);

param.name: appDomainInfo
param.span: 包含应用程序域初始化信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains application domain initialization information.
Initializes the new application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用此方法以初始化 ASP.NET 中的应用程序域。Do not use this method to initialize an application domain in ASP.NET. 在 ASP.NET 中，配置必须由主机进行处理。In ASP.NET, configuration must be handled by the host. 如果使用此方法以初始化应用程序域，主机将引发在尝试初始化应用程序域。If you use this method to initialize the application domain, the host throws when it attempts to initialize the application domain. 该异常消息指示已发生该初始化。The exception message indicates that initialization has already occurred. 在构造函数后立即调用此方法。This method is called immediately after the constructor. 默认值实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing. 自定义实现可以设置内部的类和委托，设置的接口的托管的宿主接口，或者为新设置事件处理程序。A custom implementation can set up internal classes and delegates, set up an interface with the unmanaged host interface, or set up event handlers for the new . 此外，为外接程序激活的自定义实现无法识别当前作为目标应用程序域。Also, for add-in activations, a custom implementation could identify the current as the target application domain. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，你可以使用此方法将默认应用程序域沙盒，在应用程序启动时，或修改新的应用程序域沙盒。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you can use this method to sandbox the default application domain at application startup, or to modify the sandbox of a new application domain. 若要执行此操作，调整和属性对象分配给属性`appDomainInfo`，再初始化应用程序域。To do this, adjust the and properties on the object that is assigned to the property of `appDomainInfo`, before you initialize the application domain. > [!NOTE] > 程序集，授予`FullTrust`，如在全局程序集缓存中的程序集还是已标识为`fullTrustAssemblies`中方法可以加载在构造函数和方法。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写的自定义应用程序域管理器的方法。The following example shows an override of the method for a custom application domain manager. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomainManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/CS/customAppDomainManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomainManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/VB/customAppDomainManager.vb#2)]
